snippet: Officials of North and South Korea will meet in Seoul this week for their first high-level dialogue in six years amid signs that North Korea’s traditional ally, China, has grown frustrated with its troublesome ward.
abstract: Officials of North and South Korea will meet in Seoul to discuss economic and humanitarian projects; talks, which are their first high-level dialogue in six years, will force the South to face a government that is ever more eager to expand its nuclear arsenal even as it attempts to revive its moribund economy.
lead_paragraph: Officials of North and South Korea will meet in Seoul this week for their first high-level dialogue in six years amid signs that North Korea’s traditional ally, China, has grown frustrated with its troublesome ward.

headline.seo: North Korea’s Defiance Looms Over Talks With the South
headline.main: North Korea’s Defiance Looms Over Talks
headline.print_headline: North Korea’s Defiance Looms Over Talks
